ee1cb8986c0c.description: We write down our mess, that we may marvel in what is same about us, wonder about what is different & embrace one another anyway without condition.

e1278f3d2795.bio: Have an awesome, loving, lovely Wifeling & great children. Interested in other’s stories, mostly. Have a few of my own. Upper 10% Medium Reader.

503150539ff8.bio: Writes about stuff. Dreams about writing about stuff and sometimes actually writes about stuff. A mental health advocate who looks for the magic in people.

paragraphs.text:
It is in this moment
I realize, I am in fact 
hugging myself.
paragraphs.name: 5b32
d3ac
paragraphs.text:
I am dreaming now,
I’m remembering 
what it feels like
to rest my head 
on the chest
of someone familiar.

18c461dbaaa6.title: We’re always alone, even when others are present.

content.subtitle: (If you actually think I believe this…. you are wrong. It’s hogwash and I know it! I can’t believe I even wrote it. It’s like I was trying…

paragraphs.name: f602
paragraphs.text: We’re always alone, even when others are present. Alone is alive, together is the same, just more of it. Someone said alone was lonely. It’s not. Alone does not have to be lonely. Lonely is a longing for someone, a decision that you need someone who is not present. Alone is a state of being by oneself. Lonely only comes into the picture when we…

paragraphs.name: adfb
paragraphs.text: All artists live alone.

d7c215d587cd.title: Aww, you knew these feelings would creep up now and then.

paragraphs.name: eca8
paragraphs.text: Aww, you knew these feelings would creep up now and then. Loneliness is suffocating, even when you are expecting it. Of course, it will pass. I know you know that but daaang, it sucks when it hovers over your chest and fogs up the mind. When I traveled through Israel, I had bouts of feelings of isolation and aloneness. Sometimes I felt I couldn’t…

466f11aee5cc.title: Highly relatable piece for all humans I feel.

paragraphs.text: Highly relatable piece for all humans I feel. Resembles the journey to be at peace in your solitude and describes the journey to self love ❤ Even when all alone in the world. Great piece!!!

paragraphs.name: f629
paragraphs.text: Ohhhh, honey! I’m so sorry — I know that feeling, too. I came back from my first trip overseas months early because I missed people and all sorts of crazy things: brown bread, my own bed, ice in my drinks… (This was also pre-cell phones, which didn’t help.) It gets easier, I promise. But I am just so very proud of you for going at all, and I’m sending you a virtual hug every day. ❤❤❤

paragraphs.name: d433
paragraphs.text: Xx thanks Mike Thorn

4a361cbddf60.title: *Reaches out and holds your hand for a little while, then hugs you to let you know it doesn’t…

paragraphs.name: 070a
paragraphs.text: *Reaches out and holds your hand for a little while, then hugs you to let you know it doesn’t happen to just you* Thank you. I feel your words sometimes too. We’re not alone, even when we’re alone. I’ll hug you and hold your hand anytime you need.

virtuals.subtitle: The key? Self love, always x
